summary:
My first mod in the series, made by request.
This mod removes the enchantment from the Dawnguard Helmets.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/4505/7tw.png[/img]
[size=6]Dawnguard Helmets - No Enchantments[/size]
[size=5]Made By Request[/size][/center]
 
 
 
[size=6]Description[/size]
[size=4]This mod was made by request. The name is self explanatory.[/size]
[size=4]What this mod does is removing the enchantment from the Dawnguard Full Helmet & Dawnguard Helmet.[/size]
 
 
 
[size=6]Requirements[/size]
[size=4]Dawnguard[/size]
 
 
 
[size=6]Compatibility[/size]
[size=4]This mod is compatible with every mod that doesn\'t change the enchantment on the Dawnguard Helmet. Retextures are fine.[/size]
 
 
 
[size=6]Installtion + Unistalltion[/size]
[size=4]Use the mod manager and everything should be fine.[/size]
author: AGTweaks
